GK19raggancu:4: dantāvalo gajastasyevāsyaṃ mukhaṃ yasya sa gajānanastadātmanā tadrūpeṇa pariṇataṃ taṃ bhūmānaṃ paraṃ brahmopāsmahe /
GK19raggancu:9: tadvivartarūpaḥ prapañca eva madhurāmodacchaṭātvena rūpitastena meduram /
GK19raggancu:13: vidhūto vividho vyāsaṅgo yairata eva śuddho ya āśayastasminprādurbhūtaḥ sudhārasaḥ
GK19raggancu:14: śāntisukhaṃ yeṣāṃ te ca te prasṛmaraṃ prasāri dhyānaṃ yasminnīdṛśaṃ yadāspadaṃ kaṃdarādi
GK19raggancu:16: tāraśrīparaśaktikāmavasudhārūpānugāṃ yaṃ vidustasmai stātpraṇatirgaṇādhipataye yo rāgiṇābhyarthyate /
GK19raggancu:17: āmantrya prathamaṃ vareti varadetyārtena sarvaṃ janaṃ svāminme vaśamānayeti satataṃ svāhādibhiḥ pūjitaḥ // RMgan_2 //
GK19raggancu:23: iti pañcarūpāṇāṃ bījānāmanu gamityakṣarametādṛśaṃ yaṃ sādhakā vidustasmai gaṇādhipataye praṇatiḥ stāditi yojanā /
GK19raggancu:25: ārtena rāgiṇā prathamaṃ vareti tato varadetyāmantryābhyarthyate /
GK19raggancu:29: mantre tu gaṇapataye tathā sarvajanamityekameva padam /
GK19raggancu:32: mūle kalpatarormahāmaṇimaye pīṭhe 'kṣarāmbhoruhe ṣaṭkoṇākalitatrikoṇaracanasatkarṇike 'muṃ bhaje // RMgan_3 //
GK19raggancu:33: kallolānāṃ mahormīṇāmañcalāḥ prāntāstairāśliṣṭā meghatatiryenaitādṛśa ikṣurasasamudre suradrumāṇāṃ pārijātādīnāṃ vanaṃ tadāmodena paripuṣṭe
GK19raggancu:34: ratnamayaṃ dvīpaṃ vārimadhyasthalaṃ tadgatasya kalpatarormūle mahāmaṇimayaṃ pīṭhaṃ
GK19raggancu:38: āśliṣṭaṃ priyayā sarojakarayā ratnasphuradbhūṣayā māṇikyapratimaṃ mahāgaṇapatiṃ viśveśamāśāsmahe // RMgan_4 //
GK19raggancu:49: śuṇḍāgre puṣkare jāgratsthito ghaṭo ratnapūrṇo hemakumbho yasya /
GK19raggancu:50: kamalahastayā priyayā dakṣiṇahastenāliṅgitaṃ māṇikyapratimaṃ śoṇacchaviṃ sarveśvaraṃ mahāgaṇapatimāśāsmahe //
GK19raggancu:52: trailokyeṣṭāvidhānavarṇasubhagaṃ yaḥ padmarāgopamaṃ dhatte sa śriyamātanotu satataṃ devo gaṇānāṃ patiḥ // RMgan_5 //
GK19raggancu:53: dānāmbhasā madāmbunā parimeduraṃ vyāptaṃ prasṛmarānvyālambino rolambānbhramarānbibhartīti prasṛmaravyālambirolambabhṛt /
GK19raggancu:55: padmarāgopamaṃ padmarāgo lohitakastadupamaṃ praśastidvayaṃ yo dhatte sa gaṇānāṃ patirdevaḥ satataṃ śriyamātanotu /
GK19raggancu:57: tathā dānāmbulipte sindūravati kumbhasthale bhramarā ityuktaṃ bhavati //
GK19raggancu:59: dikkāntāghanasāracandanarasāsārāḥ śrayantāṃ manaḥ svacchandaprasarapraliptaviyato herambadantatviṣaḥ // RMgan_6 //
GK19raggancu:62: bhrāmyato mandarasya ghūrṇanāvṛttayastadāyattasya kṣīrābdhervīcayo laharyastāsāṃ chaṭā agrabhāgāstaiḥ sadṛśāḥ /
GK19raggancu:74: jyotsnāpūrataraṅge mantharaṃ tarantī cāsau saṃdhyā ca tasyā vayasyāḥ sāmyātsakhyaḥ /
GK19raggancu:78: śuṇḍāpradhṛtasuvarṇakalaśasaṃgṛhītena kṣaratā bahutvādbahirapi nirgacchatā muktāmāṇikyādiratnasamūhena koṭiśaḥ sādhakajanānsaṃbhāvayannasaṃkhyātānupāsakānsaṃpadā vardhayan /
GK19raggancu:83: herambaṃ praṇamāmi yasya purataḥ śāṇḍilyamūle śriyā bibhratyāmburuhe samaṃ madhuripuste śaṅkhacakre vahan /
GK19raggancu:84: nyagrodhasya tale sahādrisutayā śaṃbhustayā dakṣiṇe bibhrāṇaḥ paraśuṃ triśūlamitayā pāśāṅkuśābhyāṃ śubham // RMgan_9 //
GK19raggancu:85: śāṇḍilyamūle bilvavṛkṣasyādho yasya mahāgaṇapateḥ purato 'grabhāge padme bibhratyā śriyā samaṃ te prasiddhe śaṅkhacakre vahanmadhuripurviṣṇurasti
GK19raggancu:86: tathā yasya dakṣiṇe nyagrodhasya tale vaṭavṛkṣādhaḥ pāśāṅkuśābhyāmitayā sahitayādrisutayā pārvatyā saha paraśuṃ triśūlaṃ ca bibhrāṇaḥ śaṃbhuḥ śivo 'sti //
GK19raggancu:87: paścātpippalamāśrito ratipatirdevasya ratyotpale bibhratyā samamaikṣavaṃ dhanuriṣūnpauṣpānvahanpañca ca /
GK19raggancu:88: vāme cakragadādharaḥ sa bhagavānkroḍaḥ priyaṃgostale hastodyacchukaśālimañjarikayā devyā dharaṇyā saha // RMgan_10 //
GK19raggancu:89: devasya paścime pippalavṛkṣasyādha utpale bibhratyā ratyā samamaikṣavaṃ dhanuḥ pañca pauṣpāniṣūṃśca vahan ratipatiḥ kāmadevo 'sti /
GK19raggancu:90: asya ca vāme priyaṃguvṛkṣādho hastodyacchukaśālimañjarikayaikasminkare kīramanyatra
GK19raggancu:91: kalamakaṇiśaṃ bibhratyā dharaṇyā saha sa prasiddho bhagavānkroḍo varāho 'sti taṃ
GK19raggancu:93: ṣaṭkoṇāśriṣu ṣaṭsu ṣaḍ gajamukhāḥ pāśāṅkuśābhīvarānbibhrāṇāḥ pramadāsakhāḥ pṛthumahāśoṇāśmapuñjatviṣaḥ /
GK19raggancu:94: āmodaḥ purataḥ pramodasumukhau taṃ cābhito durmukhaḥ paścātpārśvagato 'sya vighna iti yo vighnakarteti ca // RMgan_11 //
GK19raggancu:95: ṣaṭkoṇasya pīṭhasya ṣaṭsvaśriṣu pālīṣu ṣaḍ gajamukhā dhyeyāḥ /
GK19raggancu:100: pṛthuścāsau mahāśoṇāśmanāṃ padmarāgāṇāṃ puñjastadvattviṭ kāntiryeṣāṃ te /
GK19raggancu:110: asya durmukhasya vighna iti yasya nāma sa ekasminpārśve vighnakarteti yasya nāma sa dvitīyapārśve 'sti /
GK19raggancu:113: āmodādigaṇeśvarapriyatamāstatraiva nityaṃ sthitāḥ kāntāśleṣarasajñamantharadṛśaḥ siddhiḥ samṛddhistataḥ /
GK19raggancu:114: kāntiryā madanāvatītyapi tathā kalpeṣu yā gīyate sānyā yāpi madadravā tadaparā drāviṇyamūḥ pūjitāḥ // RMgan_12 //
GK19raggancu:115: kāntasya svasvabharturāliṅganarasaṃ jānantyata eva mantharā rāgiṇī dṛgyāsāṃ tāḥ /
GK19raggancu:116: āmodādīnāṃ pūrvaślokoktānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāryāsteṣāṃ samīpe sthitā dhyeyāḥ /
GK19raggancu:123: āśliṣṭau vasudhetyatho vasumatī tābhyāṃ sitālohitau varṣantau vasu pārśvayorvilasatastau śaṅkhapadmau nidhī /
GK19raggancu:124: aṅgānyanvatha mātaraśca paritaḥ śakrādayo 'bjāśrayāstadbāhye kuliśādayaḥ paripatatkālānalajyotiṣaḥ // RMgan_13 //
GK19raggancu:125: vasudhayā vasumatyā ca krameṇāliṅgitau śuklaraktavarṇau dhanaṃ varṣantau tau śaṅkhapadmasaṃjñau prasiddhau nidhī ṣaṭkoṇapārśvayorvilasataḥ /
GK19raggancu:129: ṣaṭkoṇādbahiḥsthite 'ṣṭadalakamala indrādayo dikpālāstadbāhye teṣāṃ samīpa eva paripatatkālānalajyotiṣaḥ pradīptasvarūpā indrādīnāṃ hetayo vajrādyā dhyeyāḥ //
GK19raggancu:131: ānandaikarasāvabodhalaharīvidhvastasarvormaye sarvatra prathamānamugdhamahase tasmai parasmai namaḥ // RMgan_14 //
GK19raggancu:145: ānandaikarasāvayodhalaharībhirvidhvastāḥ sarveṣāṃ sādhakānāmūrmayaḥ ṣaḍindriyajanyā vṛttayo yasmādityeke /
GK19raggancu:147: sarvatra prathamānaṃ mugdhaṃ sundaraṃ maho yasya tasmai parasmai jagato 'nyasmai namaḥ //
GK19raggancu:149: rājannīrājanaśrīsakhacaraṇanakhadyotavidyotamānaḥ śreyaḥ stheyaḥ sa deyānmama vimaladṛśo bandhuraṃ sindhurāsyaḥ // RMgan_15 //
GK19raggancu:153: te ca te devāsuranarāṇāṃ samūhāsteṣāṃ dedīpyamānamukuṭāgrāṇāṃ yā koṭiḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣastatra vyāṭīkamānāḥ susaṃgatāḥ sūryatulyaratnapaṅktikāntipravāhāsteṣām
GK19raggancu:154: rājantī nīrājanaśrīrārātrikaśobhā tasyāḥ sakhāyaste ca te caraṇanakhāśca teṣāṃ dyotena prakāśena vidyotamānaḥ sa prasiddhaḥ sindhurāsyo gajamukhaḥ
GK19raggancu:156: mama bandhuraṃ ramyaṃ stheyaḥ sthirataraṃ śreyaḥ kalyāṇaṃ deyāt /
GK19raggancu:159: iti pāṭhe tu saumyāvalokanena śreyo dadyādityarthaḥ //
GK19raggancu:161: yaḥ stauti pracurataraṃ mahāgaṇeśaṃ tasyeyaṃ bhavati vaśaṃvadā trilokī // RMgan_16 //
GK19raggancu:165: // iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryavaryaśrīrāghavacaitanyaviracitaṃ mahāgaṇapatistotraṃ tacchiṣyakṛtayā ṭippaṇyā sametaṃ samāptam //
